feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:12 a.m. PDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Smoke, 10.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 2:00 AM MST Wednesday 10 May 2023
Condition: Smoke
Temperature: 10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 10 km
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 7

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Otherwise clear. Widespread smoke. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Widespread smoke. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Otherwise clear. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Widespread smoke. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 9 May 2023
